Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供用于显示日历的控件功能。

span.span: Provides control capability to display a calendar.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过一天、 周或月的日历显示。The calendar display is by day, week, or month. 是否在整个月内呈现在移动设备上取决于设备的功能。Whether an entire month is rendered on a mobile device depends on the capabilities of the device. 一般情况下，控件允许选择的日期。In general, the control permits the selection of a date. 移动控件换行 Web 窗体控件。The mobile control wraps a Web Forms control. 尽管移动控制模拟某些属性、 方法和事件的基础控件，它不会公开特定于 HTML 呈现其他属性。Although the mobile control mimics some properties, methods, and events of the underlying control, it does not expose other properties specific to HTML rendering. 若要修改这些，您可以访问通过基础控件属性，并直接修改设置。To modify these, you can access the underlying control through the property and modify the settings directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将页面加载代码块中的属性允许用户选择一天、 一周或月的时间块。The following code example shows how the property in the page load code block allows the user to select a day, a week, or a month block of time. 此示例设置并的属性来区分用户选择的类。This example sets the and properties of the class to distinguish the user selection. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`null`，默认值为本地化的字符串 （例如，"日历"）。When this property is set to `null`, the default is the localized string (for example, "Calendar"). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来设置向用户显示的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the text that is displayed to the user. 此示例的更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET API 中，枚举返回服务器的本地设置一周的第一天的默认值包含每个日期是星期几。In the ASP.NET API, the enumeration contains every day of the week, with the default value returning the server's local setting for the first day of the week. 该属性的运行方式与相同属性。This property functions the same way as the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户选择一天、 一周或整月，通过单击日期选择器控件时引发事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 重写时方法在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by ASP.NET. 它提供包装器引发事件时由用户选择日期。It provides a wrapper to raise the event when a date is selected by the user. 与不同方法，此方法是公共的并在收集所选的日期不同的适配器可以调用。Unlike the method, this method is public and can be called by different adapters when they have collected the selected date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，使用此属性连同属性来确定所选的日期的控件。Typically, you use this property together with the property to determine the selected date of a control. 若要执行此操作，设置属性设置为-此设置允许仅从选择一个日期控件。To do this, set the property to - this setting allows only a single date selection from the control. 浏览到下一步或上一个月份不会更新此属性。Browsing to the next or previous month will not update this property. 此属性具有相同的功能作为 ASP.NET属性。This property has the same functionality as the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来引用所选的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to the use the property to refer to the selected day. 此示例的更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 窗体枚举提供下表中所述的选择。The Web Forms enumeration provides the selections described in the following table. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期。A single date can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单日或整周。A single date or entire week can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期、周或整月。A single date, week, or entire month can be selected on the control.| ||在 控件上不能选择任何日期。No dates can be selected on the control. **注意：** 避免使用此值，因为某些浏览器仍允许用户选择日期。**Note:** Avoid using this value, because some browsers still allow the user to select a date.|

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性更新后引发事件。The property is updated after the event is raised. 日期可以是月中的任意一天。The date can be any day within the month. 仅的月份值使用对象。Only the month value of the object is used. 此属性具有相同的功能作为 Web 窗体属性。This property has the same functionality as the Web Forms property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来设置可见日期的日历上。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the visible dates on the calendar. 此示例的更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. summary.span: 获取基础 Web 窗体 控件。

span.span: Gets the underlying Web Forms control.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 移动控件均不重复的 ASP.NET Web 窗体属性不支持移动设备的控件。The ASP.NET mobile controls do not duplicate the properties of the ASP.NET Web Forms control that are not supported on mobile devices. 因此，如果你想要使用功能可用于基础控件，则执行操作来访问对象，通过属性。Thus, if you want to use features that are available for the underlying control, you do so by accessing the object through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来应用格式设置选项仅适用于基础控件。The following code example uses the property to apply formatting that is only available in the underlying control. 此示例的更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)] [!code-vb[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)]
